metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42258 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer (nvidia.ko), where an integer overflow may lead to denial ofservice, data tampering, or information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
